message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200. It's a great deal for something of this quality!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but I can't let it go for that low. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit stretched at $140. How about we meet in the middle from there, at $110?
